fields.name: Q: What is Kishimoto Inu?
fields.value: A: Anime&Inu based ERC20 Token on the Ethereum Blockchain ([link](https://etherscan.io/token/0xf5b1fd29d23e98db2d9ebb8435e1082e3b38fb65 "https://etherscan.io/token/0xf5b1fd29d23e98db2d9ebb8435e1082e3b38fb65")). The **Whitepaper** explains the value of the project which can be found [here](https://kishimotoinu.com/KishimotoInuwhitepaper.pdf "https://kishimotoinu.com/KishimotoInuwhitepaper.pdf")

fields.name: Q: When did Kishimoto Inu launch?
Q: Is the Smart Contract audited?
Q: I have a proposal who can I contact?
Q: What is the address of the contract?
fields.value:
A: We are on the ETH and BSC chain:
- ETH: 0xf5b1fd29d23e98db2d9ebb8435e1082e3b38fb65
- BSC: 0xCAb599D699f818e6ceFd07cF54f448DAB9367B05

fields.name: Q: Why are the token prices different on centralized exchanges?
fields.value: A: Centralized exchanges (*CEXs*) have there own order book that must be reconciled between the buys and sells for that particular asset and for each pairing

fields.name: Q: When purchasing Kishimoto Inu tokens on a DEX, what should my slippage tolerance be set to?
fields.value: A: Slippage should be 12-15% for further questions go to <#900975814336712714> community member will help :ninja:

fields.name: Q: Where can I buy Kishimoto Inu?
fields.value:
A: On our own DEX [KishiSwap](https://kishiswap.com/swap?outputCurrency=0xf5b1Fd29d23e98Db2D9EBb8435E1082e3B38FB65 "Kishiswap") or on any  DEXs and CEXs which are listed below.

*Decentralized Exchanges (DEXs)*:
-	[Uniswap](https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?exactField=input&exactAmount=10&outputCurrency=0xf5b1fd29d23e98db2d9ebb8435e1082e3b38fb65 "Uniswap")
-	[ShibaSwap](https://shibaswap.com/#/swap?outputCurrency=0xf5b1Fd29d23e98Db2D9EBb8435E1082e3B38FB65 "Shibaswap")
-	[FEGex](https://fegex.com/ "FEGex")

*Centralized Exchanges:*
-	[Hotbit](https://www.hotbit.io/exchange?symbol=KISHIMOTO_nUSD "Hotbit")
-	[Lbank](https://www.lbank.info/exchange/kishimoto/usdt "Lbank")
-	[BKEX](https://www.bkex.com/trade/KISHIMOTO_USDT "Bkex")
-	[ZT](https://www.ztb.im/exchange?coin=KISHIMOTO_USDT "Zt")
-	[XT](https://www.xt.com/tradePro/kishimoto_usdt "Xt")
-	[WhiteBit](https://whitebit.com/trade/KISHI_DECL "WhiteBit")
